channel.title: How do i make server non-hamachi?
channel.description:
Well , ever since ive had my hamachi server coded with a few members i really wanted to make it non hamachi like summin like...xxnathanxx.no-ip.org
i haev alredy made a host and dowloaded no-ip DUC on www.no-ip.com so i need to know what to do next because i dont want to advertise till i have my server non hamchi
please help and reply
P.S i am on a wireless internet router from comp in my house...i can get the ip adress of teh comp i get wireless from if i need

item.title: How do i make server non-hamachi?
item.dc:creator: @MoparScaperDude MoparScaperDude
item.description:
@MoparScaperDude wrote:

It’s simple. Just open up the 43594 (or the other port if you use a different one), download a source, open the No-IP DUC, and run the server.

Read full topic
